message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
